message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Take 1000, I'll take 9000. We can end this quickly and fairly.
You're being too greedy, Alice. I'll give you a fair share, but I'm not giving you all the money.
Okay, Bob, let's be reasonable.  I'll take a smaller share this time, but I need a larger portion than your last offer.  Let's finish this.
I'm not getting any younger, Alice. I need a bigger share to live comfortably. You can have a smaller portion, but I'm not budging.
